item.title: Retrofit Sound Pack!
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Like @TheRealJFalc says, get another app with samples and loops and just import. Or use something like GB, Sampletank, etc etc record a loop you want less than 20 seconds and import to drum channel. Unless Auxy gonna have loops and audio tracks too (uh, hella yeah that would be sweet) then this is your next best option, plus you’ll get more real sounding instruments.

Read full topic

item.title: Retrofit Sound Pack!
item.dc:creator: Vokon
item.description:
I think that I might be the only one who is struggling to find a use for these sounds in my songs. I focus on more organic or chill songs. I love RAC essentials. Its my favorite pack. For some reason this pack isn’t that way. It just doesn’t seem right to me. My favorite sound is Mcfluty, but even that sound doesn’t really fit with my songs. If anyone sees a place where it could fit into my style, please tell me by replying. I would be happy to know.

Read full topic

item.title: Retrofit Sound Pack!
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
While yes, I do agree that there are plenty of electronic sounds in Auxy to begin with, remember that Auxy is an electronic-focused application. While I do agree there would be more help in having a stronger variety of instruments, some suggestions from the developers suggest that premade instrument loops would be a much better route for expanding the sound rather than forcing samples into a playable format, which I partially agree with (and disagree with at the same time due to personal preference. But I completely understand the logic and support it. I only have a personal preference for customization over authenticity).

This is the first pack since RAC Esssentials to really focus more on analogue-esque sound, and it was a highly requested pack for a long time. It’s also versatile. With the introduction of twenty-second imports, you can effectively import real instrument loops into your songs and achieve the desired effect. You literally could record it from GarageBand on iOS if you wanted to, it would be that simple.

While there is value in customization, i’d much rather wait for the perfection it would take to make more real instruments optimal, rather than take a quick solution that doesn’t sound as good.

Read full topic

item.title: Retrofit Sound Pack!
item.dc:creator: EVERANGE
item.description:
I’$ be lying to myself if I said I was pleased. It’s kind of the same thing over and over and over. Where is the variety. We mostly only have synths and other electronic sounds on Auxy. We need more sounds from other genres because right now all we have is a plethora of synth sounds. We waited for more than a whole month, only to get the same sounds with small tweaks. I think Auxy needs to step up thier game. I hope next month delivers better sounds.

Read full topic
